mapper.select: SELECT mdmd.CODE code, mdmd.NAME name, mdms.CODE stationcode, mdms.NAME stationname FROM UAP65.MDM_DOT mdmd INNER JOIN UAP65.MDM_STATION mdms ON mdmd.NAME = mdms.NAME

SELECT mdmd.CODE code, mdmd.NAME name, mdms.CODE stationcode, mdms.NAME stationname FROM UAP65.MDM_DOT mdmd FULL JOIN UAP65.MDM_STATION mdms ON mdmd.NAME = mdms.NAME WHERE mdmd.NAME IS NULL OR mdms.NAME IS NULL

SELECT mdmd.CODE code, mdmd.NAME name, mdms.CODE stationcode, mdms.NAME stationname FROM UAP65.MDM_DOT mdmd FULL JOIN UAP65.MDM_STATION mdms ON mdmd.NAME = mdms.NAME WHERE mdmd.NAME IS NULL OR mdms.NAME IS NULL
